headline: Pryzm Raises $12M Led by Andreessen Horowitz to Transform Federal Procurement with AI
summary: Pryzm today announced a $12.2 million seed funding round led by Andreessen Horowitz's (a16z) American Dynamism fund, with participation from existing investors XYZ Venture Capital, Amplify.LA, and Forum Ventures. The raise advances Pryzm's mission to modernize how the federal government discovers, evaluates, and acquires emerging technology, while giving industry a clearer, faster path to identify opportunities, shape demand and compete on capability.
